description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter application. It sets up the app with a MaterialApp widget, including theme, title, and home page, and defines a simple StatefulWidget that displays a loading message with a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that initializes the MaterialApp and sets global theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the home screen with a title. It's a container for the _MyHomePageState class.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: The state class for MyHomePage, building the scaffold with app bar and centered loading message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the Flutter application that executes runApp with MyApp instance.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp, MyHomePage, and _MyHomePageState, structuring the UI
